name: transport, freight, aircraft, all distances to generic market for transport, freight, aircraft, unspecified | transport, freight, aircraft, unspecified | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21073/documentation

This is a linking activity which transfers part of the production volume of the specific transport, freight, aircraft of all distances to the generic market for transport, freight, aircraft, unspecified.;The transport, freight, lorry, unspecified is meant to be used by activities, where the distance of the transport supplied is unkown. 

The activity starts with the input of the transport activities for the different flight distances. The mix is based on the production volumes of the respective transforming activities.

The activity ends with the supply of 1 metric ton*km of generic (i.e. unspecified) transport.
category: H:Transportation and storage/51:Air transport/512:Freight air transport/5120:Freight air transport

flow.name: transport, freight, aircraft, unspecified
flow.category: H:Transportation and storage/51:Air transport/512:Freight air transport/5120:Freight air transport

exchanges.description:
Calculated from the production volumes.

The production volume is taken from the "transport, freight, aircraft, ... haul" activities. 

It is estimated, that 10% of this transport is used for transport of goods in need of atmosphere control. 

It is also estimated, that 50% of the production volume of this transport is transfered to the generic market for transport, freight, aircraft, unspecified. Which means, that 50% of people using this transport do not know or do not care about the distance travelled.
